taskDescription: Compound B is isomeric with A (Problem 19-78) and shows an IR peak at 1715 cm–1. The 1H NMR spectrum of B has peaks at 2.4 δ (1 H, septet, J = 7 Hz), 2.1 δ (3 H, singlet), and 1.2 δ (6 H, doublet, J = 7 Hz). What is the structure of B?
